title: Jackie Chan Adventures: The Search for the Talismans
overview: Amateur archeologist, undercover agent and world-famous action hero Jackie Chan has his hands full when his 11-year-old niece Jade -- who's a chip off the old block -- arrives in San Francisco to live with her uncle. Meanwhile, Jackie's accidental discovery of a coveted ancient Chinese talisman has an evil criminal enterprise known as the Dark Hand, led by the villainous Valmont, chasing after him.
